Description: Enterprise-grade infrastructure for modern web application with HA and security - Production Ready

EnvironmentName.Description: Environment name prefix for resource naming

ProjectName.Description: Project name for tagging and cost tracking

KeyPairName.Description: EC2 Key Pair for SSH access
KeyPairName.ConstraintDescription: Must be blank or a valid EC2 key pair name

InstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for web servers

DBMasterPassword.Description: Database master password (must include uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters)
DBMasterPassword.ConstraintDescription: Must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character

AlertEmail.Description: Email address for CloudWatch alarm notifications
AlertEmail.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid email address

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for Application Load Balancer

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: Allow MySQL/Aurora access from web servers

AlarmDescription.Fn::Sub: High CPU usage on ${EnvironmentName} Auto Scaling Group
Low CPU usage on ${EnvironmentName} Auto Scaling Group
High CPU usage on ${EnvironmentName} RDS Database
Low storage space on ${EnvironmentName} RDS Database
Unhealthy targets in ${EnvironmentName} ALB Target Group

ApplicationLoadBalancerDNS.Description: DNS name of the Application Load Balancer

ApplicationLoadBalancerURL.Description: URL of the Application Load Balancer

ApplicationLoadBalancerArn.Description: ARN of the Application Load Balancer

NATGateway1IP.Description: Elastic IP address of NAT Gateway AZ1

NATGateway2IP.Description: Elastic IP address of NAT Gateway AZ2

ALBSecurityGroupId.Description: Security Group ID for Application Load Balancer

WebServerSecurityGroupId.Description: Security Group ID for Web Servers

AutoScalingGroupName.Description: Name of the Auto Scaling Group

LaunchTemplateId.Description: ID of the EC2 Launch Template

EC2RoleArn.Description: ARN of the EC2 IAM Role

EC2InstanceProfileArn.Description: ARN of the EC2 Instance Profile

AlarmTopicArn.Description: ARN of SNS Topic for Alarms
